channel.title: Our Progress on Vex | hugo landing page template
channel.description: Recent content in Our Progress on Vex | hugo landing page template

item.title: Dashboard App Back End: MongoDB and GraphQL
item.description: Aadi Bajpai, a rising sophomore at Vanderbilt University studying Computer Science, shares his journey with constructing firm and fluid backend.

item.title: Dashboard App Front End: Ionic React
item.description: David Seo, a rising junior at Vanderbilt University studying Computer Science and Applied Mathematics, shares his journey with constructing smooth and easy-to-use User Interface for the Dashboard App using Ionic React.

item.title: License Detection App: OpenALPR and React Native
item.description: David Seo, a rising junior at Vanderbilt University studying Computer Science and Applied Mathematics, shares his journey with constructing easy-to-use license detection app using React Native.

item.title: Team Work
item.description: Professor Daniel A. Balasubramanian, Aadi Bajpai, and David Seo share their experience with collaborating with each other both remotely and in-person.
